results.question: How do I make a chat completion request with Eden AI?
results.actual_answer_preview:
To make a chat completion request with Eden AI, send a POST request to `https://api.edenai.run/v3/llm/chat/completions` with your API key and a model string in `provider/model` format.

**Example (Python):**
```python
import requests

response = requests.post(
    "https://api.edenai.run/v3/llm/chat
